short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color from cursor, Curlor changes the color of text hex, rgb and htl values to their respective colors within the browser window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curlor automatically changes either the text color, background or both of hex, rgb and hsl values shown within the browser to the correct color. Configurable options allow the color change to occur automatically or upon cursor hover. This is a helpful tool when working with color text values as the color represented by the text value is shown in real time within the browser window.

This extension works by traversing the DOM for each visited website. Depending on the framework used this can sometime cause issues with certain sites. To alleviate this problem Curlor includes a whitelist capability allowing user to quickly add domains to the Curlor whitelist. This ensures that the extension does not need to be completely disabled when issues caused by DOM traversal occur.
